title: Add Intel SGX secure enclave support
description: Implement Intel SGX integration for isolated crypto operations. Create enclave for key operations. Add remote attestation. Protect keys from OS-level attacks.

title: Fix Tauri dialog permission error
description: Add window label to tauri.conf.json to match capability definition

title: Delete forked crate directories
description: Remove aes-gcm-fork, rustcrypto-traits-fork, rustcrypto-utils-fork, rustcrypto-block-modes-fork directories

title: Replace Tauri/React with native Rust GUI
description: Switch to egui or native-windows-gui for a proper native interface like VeraCrypt. No more npm/webpack bloat.

title: Convert Windows-specific features to cross-platform
description: Windows Registry integration (winreg) for file associations is currently Windows-only. Need to implement cross-platform file association registration for Linux and macOS.

title: Add hardware crypto acceleration detection
description: Detect and use AES-NI, AVX2, SHA extensions. Add Intel QuickAssist Technology (QAT) support. Benchmark hardware vs software crypto performance.

title: Add cargo-vet for supply chain trust verification
description:
cargo-vet provides first-party code review auditing for dependencies, complementing cargo-audit.

Implementation:
1. Initialize cargo-vet in the repository
2. Import existing audits from Mozilla's supply chain
3. Configure vet policies for crypto dependencies
4. Add CI check to ensure audits are up-to-date

Setup:
  cargo install cargo-vet
  cargo vet init
  cargo vet import mozilla

CI integration:
  - name: Verify dependency audits
    run: |
      cargo install cargo-vet
      cargo vet check

Focus on auditing critical dependencies:
- aes-gcm
- argon2
- chacha20poly1305
- ed25519-dalek
- ml-kem

title: Implement NIST-compliant V3 format with proper nonce concatenation
description: Replace V2 XOR-based nonce construction with NIST SP 800-38D compliant concatenation (Fixed || Counter). Update to SCRYPTv3 magic bytes.

title: Implement FIDO2/WebAuthn authentication
description: Add passwordless authentication using FIDO2/WebAuthn. Support multiple authenticators. Implement attestation verification and resident keys.

title: Redesign GUI to match mockup
description: Implement the exact design from screenshot - gradient background, pill buttons, grid layout

title: Add complete Volume management UI to GUI
description: Implement full-featured Volume management UI in the GUI to match CLI capabilities including: volume creation, mounting/unmounting, password management, recovery keys, hidden volumes, and volume info display. Currently the GUI only has Mode::Volume stubs with no actual implementation.

title: Implement volume auto-mount
description: Add auto-mount on startup, save preferred mount points, handle mount failures gracefully, background mounting

title: Implement memory scrubbing
description: Securely zero memory on deallocation. Use volatile writes resistant to compiler optimization. Extend existing zeroize integration.

title: Research FUSE/Dokany/WinFsp options
description: Evaluate userspace filesystem libraries for each platform

title: Memory Encryption & Protection Suite
description: Protect sensitive data in RAM using encrypted memory pools, mlock(), guard pages, memory scrubbing, debugger detection, and Intel TME support.

title: Add blockchain export and import
description: Export blockchain to standard formats (JSON, Protobuf). Support selective export for compliance. Implement chain merging for multi-device scenarios.

title: Design PQC volume header format
description: Extend volume header format to support PQC keys and signatures. Include algorithm identifiers, public keys, and signature fields. Maintain backward compatibility with V3 format.

title: Create daemon binary with IPC for volume management
description: Create src/bin/daemon/main.rs with long-running process, Unix domain socket IPC, and DaemonCommand/DaemonResponse protocol for mount/unmount/list operations

title: Implement end-to-end encryption
description: Add E2E encryption for network operations. Use Signal protocol or Noise framework. Implement key exchange and ratcheting. Zero-trust architecture.

title: Phase 1: Architectural Refactoring
description: Refactor monolithic main.rs into modular, extensible architecture with proper testing

title: Implement partial homomorphic encryption
description: Implement PHE for specific operations (addition/multiplication). Support Paillier or ElGamal schemes. Integrate with volume encryption.

title: Add volume resize support
description: Expand/shrink container size

title: Phase 4: Whole Drive Encryption
description: Implement encrypted container volumes with FUSE/Dokany

title: Create tamper-proof audit trails
description: Implement chain integrity verification. Add digital signatures per block. Enable third-party auditing without key access. Generate compliance reports.

title: Add group policy support
description: Centralized policy distribution for organizations

title: Implement policy enforcement engine
description: Mandatory encryption rules and compliance checking

title: Add FUSE/WinFsp dependencies
description: Add fuser (Linux/macOS) and winfsp (Windows) crates to Cargo.toml based on research findings

title: Optimize WASM bundle size
description: Minimize WASM binary size with wasm-opt. Use feature flags to exclude unused crypto. Benchmark bundle size vs performance trade-offs.

title: Add WASM security hardening
description: Implement Content Security Policy for WASM. Add WASM integrity checking. Protect against side-channel attacks in browser environment.

title: Add CI verification checks
description: Integrate verification into CI/CD pipeline. Run proofs on every commit. Fail builds if verification fails. Add verification status badges.

title: Add multi-threaded chunk processing
description: Implement parallel chunk encryption/decryption

title: Implement multi-user collaboration
description: Support multiple users accessing same encrypted volume. Implement capability-based access control. Add conflict resolution for concurrent edits. Real-time sync.

title: Add guard pages for overflow detection
description: Place guard pages around sensitive allocations. Detect buffer overflows immediately. Add canary values for stack protection.

title: Benchmark large file performance
description: Test with files 1GB-100GB, measure throughput

title: Verify Argon2id implementation
description: Formally verify Argon2id key derivation. Prove: deterministic output for same inputs, no timing side-channels, memory bounds respected.

title: Write volume integration tests
description: Create comprehensive tests: create volumes, mount/unmount, read/write files, cross-platform compatibility, error handling, concurrent access

title: Design enterprise key management system
description: Central key escrow, recovery, and rotation

title: Remove [patch.crates-io] section from Cargo.toml
description: Remove all patch entries for crypto-common, cipher, aead, inout, block-buffer, digest, universal-hash, ctr

title: Implement secure deletion (DoD 5220.22-M)
description: Multi-pass secure file deletion. Support DoD 5220.22-M (7-pass), Gutmann (35-pass), custom patterns. Verify deletion completeness.

title: Phase 2: Large File Support (Streaming)
description: Implement chunked encryption for files of any size with progress tracking

title: Add resumable operations
description: Support pausing and resuming large file operations

title: Implement progress display
description: Real-time speed, progress bar, time remaining, pause/resume

title: Add unit tests for all modules
description: Write comprehensive unit tests for crypto, storage, validation, error, and config modules

title: Create hybrid classical+PQC encryption mode
description: Implement hybrid encryption combining AES-256-GCM with Kyber KEM. Ensures security even if PQC algorithms are broken. Add configuration option for hybrid vs PQC-only mode.

title: Implement daemon-based volume unmount
description: Create persistent volume manager daemon to track mounts across processes and enable proper unmount functionality (currently placeholder in main.rs:326)

title: Create storage module
description: Implement StorageBackend trait for file I/O operations

title: Create config module
description: Implement configuration management with defaults

title: Implement audit logging
description: Comprehensive logging of all encryption operations

title: Phase 5: Boot Time Encryption
description: Pre-boot authentication and full disk encryption

title: Create secure heap allocator
description: Build custom secure allocator combining all memory protections. Use as global allocator option. Benchmark performance overhead.

title: Create cross-platform FS abstraction
description: Implement EncryptedFilesystem trait that abstracts over platform-specific FUSE/WinFsp implementations with common interface

title: Implement forensics tool detection
description: Detect running forensics tools (EnCase, FTK, Autopsy, Volatility). Optionally lock volumes or clear keys on detection. Log detection events.

title: Implement volume mounting (Windows)
description: Mount containers using Dokany/WinFsp

title: Set up formal verification toolchain
description: Install and configure selected verification tools. Set up CI integration. Create verification workflow documentation. Add verification dependencies to project.

title: Document SSD secure deletion limitations
description: Document that multi-pass file overwriting (DoD, Gutmann) is ineffective on SSDs due to wear-leveling. Explain only options are: hardware secure erase, full-disk encryption from start, or physical destruction.

title: Implement backup header functionality
description: Write write_backup_header() that duplicates metadata to volume_size - HEADER_AREA_SIZE. Add read_backup_header() for recovery. Verify both headers match on volume open.

title: Implement chunked file reader
description: Create streaming file reader with configurable chunk size

title: Implement power state monitoring callbacks
description: Wire up PowerStateMonitor.invoke_callback() in src/memory/dump_protection.rs:186 to detect power events (sleep/hibernate/shutdown) and trigger secure memory wiping

title: V2 PQC: Multi-password support
description: Current V2 implementation only supports single password. Adding additional passwords via add_password() creates slots that cannot unlock the volume because the encrypted_decapsulation_key in PQ metadata is tied to the first password. Solution: Store per-slot encrypted_shared_secret or encrypted_decapsulation_key in PQ metadata structure.

title: Implement YubiKey HMAC-SHA1 challenge-response
description: Integrate YubiKey 5 for two-factor authentication. Use HMAC-SHA1 challenge-response mode. Support slot configuration and backup keys.

title: Implement PQC volume migration tool
description: Create tool to migrate existing volumes to PQC encryption. Support in-place upgrade of headers and key slots. Add rollback capability for safety.

title: Implement sector-based encryption
description: XTS-AES-256 for transparent disk encryption

title: Set up WASM build pipeline
description: Configure wasm-pack and wasm-bindgen. Set up cross-compilation for wasm32-unknown-unknown. Add WASM build to CI/CD pipeline.

title: Implement volume header format
description: Design and implement encrypted volume header with metadata: version, cipher info, IV, salt, volume size, sector size, creation date

title: Write volume format specification document
description: Document complete volume format specification: magic numbers, version, layout, header structure, key slots, encryption scheme. Essential for interoperability and auditing.

title: Create validation module
description: Extract password validation logic into dedicated module

title: WebAssembly Cryptography Engine
description: Compile core cryptographic functionality to WebAssembly for secure browser-based encryption/decryption. Enables zero-knowledge web apps and cross-platform compatibility.

title: Design pre-boot auth environment
description: Minimal UI for password entry before OS loads

title: Add SFTP frontend
description: Implement SFTP server for encrypted access. Use SSH key-based authentication. Support standard SFTP clients. Add chroot jailing for security.

title: Add TRIM command coordination
description: Coordinate TRIM/DISCARD commands with secure deletion. Ensure SSD firmware properly erases cells. Detect and warn about untrimmed SSDs.

title: Ensure sector encryption uses sector-index-based nonces
description: Verify and document that sector-based encryption incorporates sector index into nonce generation to prevent nonce reuse. If same nonce is used for two different sectors, confidentiality is lost. The nonce should include sector_index + modification_counter.

title: Implement duress password CLI and GUI
description: Add CLI commands and GUI options to set/remove duress password. Backend already implemented in keyslot.rs and container.rs.

title: Add compliance reporting
description: Generate reports for SOC2, HIPAA, GDPR compliance

title: Implement multi-device key backup
description: Support key recovery across multiple hardware devices. Split master key across YubiKey + TPM. Implement M-of-N recovery schemes.

title: Add filesystem recovery and fsck functionality
description: Implement filesystem consistency checking and recovery: 1) Detect corrupted inodes 2) Recover from incomplete writes 3) Replay journal entries 4) Rebuild free block bitmap from inodes

title: Phase 3: Professional GUI
description: Build cross-platform GUI with Tauri + React/Svelte

title: Update aes-gcm dependency to upstream 0.11.0-rc.2
description: Change from path dependency to crates.io version

title: Write formal specifications for crypto primitives
description: Define formal properties for AES-GCM, Argon2id, XTS-AES. Specify pre/post-conditions, invariants, and security properties. Use tool-specific annotation syntax.

title: Add context menu integration
description: Right-click encrypt/decrypt in file explorer

title: Integrate power callbacks with VolumeManager
description: Implement PowerCallback for VolumeManager to unmount volumes on suspend and clear sensitive memory

title: Create JavaScript bindings
description: Generate TypeScript definitions with wasm-bindgen. Create ergonomic JS API for encryption/decryption. Handle Promise-based async operations.

title: Create lib.rs library interface
description: Create public library API exposing core functionality

title: Design encrypted container format
description: Define container header, master key storage, volume encryption

title: Add PQC support for hidden volumes
description: Implement post-quantum cryptography support for hidden volumes (TODO at container.rs:1172)

title: Create HSM abstraction layer
description: Design unified HSM interface abstracting YubiKey, TPM, SGX, smart cards. Provide consistent API for key operations. Support multiple HSM backends simultaneously.

title: Implement Phase 5b: True pre-boot encryption
description: Custom bootloader with pre-boot authentication

title: Integrate ML-KEM-1024 with file encryption for hybrid post-quantum security
description: Implement hybrid encryption using ML-KEM-1024 for key encapsulation combined with AES-256-GCM for data encryption. This provides quantum-resistant protection.

title: Improve GUI layout and UX
description: Make interface more compact and intuitive like VeraCrypt

title: Add dummy traffic generation
description: Generate decoy I/O operations to obfuscate real access patterns. Randomize operation timing. Make traffic analysis harder.

title: Implement smart card PIV support
description: Add PIV (Personal Identity Verification) smart card support. Implement PKCS#11 interface. Support certificate-based authentication and key storage.

title: Compile crypto core to WASM
description: Compile AES-GCM, Argon2id, streaming encryption to WASM. Ensure no_std compatibility. Handle memory management in WASM environment.

title: Implement volume mounting (macOS)
description: Mount containers using macFUSE

title: Add WebDAV frontend
description: Implement WebDAV server for encrypted volumes. Support mounting as network drive. Add authentication and access control. Cross-platform client support.

title: Design file format v2
description: Create new file format supporting chunked encryption with metadata

title: Write HE usage examples and docs
description: Create example applications using HE. Write comprehensive HE documentation. Add tutorials for encrypted search and computation.

title: Research bootloader technologies
description: Study GRUB, UEFI, custom bootloaders for pre-boot auth

title: Add file associations
description: Register .scrypt file extension handler

title: Add anti-DMA attack protection
description: Enable IOMMU/VT-d to prevent DMA attacks. Protect memory from FireWire/Thunderbolt attacks. Add DMA remapping for sensitive regions.

title: Formal Verification of Cryptographic Core
description: Mathematically verify security properties of crypto implementations using formal verification tools (Prusti, Kani, Creusot). Generate machine-checked proofs for correctness and security.

title: Add header checksum to VolumeHeader
description: Add checksum: [u8; 32] field to VolumeHeader struct. Use BLAKE3 for fast, cryptographically strong checksums. Verify checksum on volume open to detect corruption/tampering.

title: Add PQC performance benchmarks
description: Benchmark Kyber KEM vs classical key exchange. Benchmark Dilithium signing/verification. Compare hybrid mode overhead. Document performance characteristics.

title: Add perfect forward secrecy
description: Implement PFS for network protocol. Rotate session keys frequently. Ensure past sessions remain secure if long-term keys compromised.

title: Create network mount daemon
description: Build background daemon for network mounts. Auto-reconnect on network failures. Cache frequently accessed files. Manage multiple connections.

title: Implement server-side HE operations
description: Enable server to perform operations on encrypted data. Implement file deduplication on encrypted data. Add encrypted backup verification.

title: Extract error types into src/error.rs
description: Move CryptorError enum and related types to dedicated error module

title: Implement main window UI
description: Drag-drop area, file browser, operation buttons

title: Verify AES-GCM implementation
description: Formally verify AES-GCM encryption/decryption correctness. Prove: decryption inverts encryption, tag verification prevents tampering, no key leakage.

title: Add integration tests
description: Create end-to-end tests for encrypt/decrypt workflows

title: Design streaming encryption architecture
description: Design chunk-based encryption with unique nonces per chunk

title: Implement platform-specific service registration for daemon
description: Add service registration for Windows Service API, Linux systemd, and macOS LaunchDaemon

title: Create peer-to-peer file sharing
description: Implement P2P encrypted file transfer. Support NAT traversal (STUN/TURN). Add peer discovery and authentication. Use libp2p or custom protocol.

title: Create encrypted memory pool
description: Implement custom allocator with encryption at rest. Use lightweight cipher (ChaCha20) for RAM encryption. Support different security levels per allocation.

title: Adjust panel transparency
description: Make white panel more translucent to show gradient background

title: Create demo web application
description: Build demo SPA showcasing WASM crypto. Implement drag-and-drop file encryption. Add password strength meter. Deploy to GitHub Pages.

title: Implement V2 PQC volume creation and mounting
description: Integrate ML-KEM-1024 hybrid encryption into Container API. Update create() to generate PQ keys and write V2 headers. Update open() to read V2 headers and derive hybrid keys from password + ML-KEM shared secret.

title: Implement volume mounting (Linux)
description: Mount containers as virtual drives using FUSE

title: Anti-Forensics Hardening Suite
description: Implement comprehensive anti-forensics protections: secure deletion, metadata sanitization, anti-cold-boot, anti-DMA, forensics tool detection, SSD wear-leveling awareness.

title: Implement chunked encryptor
description: Encrypt files chunk-by-chunk with progress tracking

title: Add system tray integration
description: Tray icon with quick actions and status

title: Add AMD SEV support
description: Implement AMD Secure Encrypted Virtualization support. Enable VM-level isolation. Support SEV-SNP attestation. Protect keys in virtualized environments.

title: Add notification system
description: Desktop notifications for completion/errors

title: Transform Secure Cryptor into Professional Encryption Suite
description: Main epic for transforming the CLI tool into a full-featured encryption product with GUI, large file support, drive encryption, and boot-time encryption

title: Set up Tauri project structure
description: Initialize Tauri with React/Svelte frontend

title: Implement chunking logic for logical offset to chunk ID mapping
description: Implement struct that translates logical byte offsets to specific Chunk IDs and offsets within chunks. VolumeHeader mentions sector_size - need to map logical offset (e.g., byte 5000) to chunk ID and chunk-relative offset for 4MB chunks.

title: Add anti-cold-boot attack protection
description: Protect against RAM freezing attacks. Encrypt keys in RAM. Implement key splitting across memory regions. Add RAM overwrite on shutdown.

title: Implement local blockchain
description: Build local blockchain for audit logging. Implement block creation, chain validation, merkle proofs. Support multiple chains per device.

title: Implement TPM 2.0 integration
description: Seal/unseal keys using TPM for measured boot

title: Add emergency header backup
description: Backup/restore volume headers for recovery

title: Integrate VolumeIOFilesystem with FUSE adapter
description: Update the FUSE adapter (src/volume/mount/fuse.rs) to use VolumeIOFilesystem instead of InMemoryFilesystem. This makes mounted volumes persistent on Linux/macOS.

title: Enhance TPM 2.0 key sealing
description: Extend existing TPM integration with advanced key sealing. Bind keys to PCR measurements. Support TPM-based authentication and sealed key storage.

title: Implement settings panel
description: Algorithm selection, parameters, theme, preferences

title: Add Active Directory integration
description: Enterprise authentication with AD/LDAP

title: Create audit log viewer GUI
description: Build graphical audit log viewer. Support filtering, searching, timeline view. Export audit reports to PDF/CSV. Add compliance templates (HIPAA, SOC2).

title: Fix CI compilation errors for cross-platform builds
description:
CI was failing on Ubuntu because:
1. Windows service code tried to compile on Linux (tesseract_lib::daemon::service)
2. GUI binaries require Windows-specific dependencies (tray-icon, notify-rust, dirs, image)
3. Unused struct fields in Wycheproof tests causing warnings

Fixed:
- Added #[cfg(not(windows))] guards to return Unsupported errors on non-Windows platforms for service commands
- Modified Wycheproof CI job to build library only (cargo build --lib)
- Removed unused Serialize import
- Added #[allow(dead_code)] to test_type and algorithm fields in test structs

Verification:
- cargo build --lib works on all platforms
- Wycheproof tests pass (66/66)
- No compilation warnings

title: Design homomorphic encryption architecture
description: Design HE integration architecture. Define which operations support HE. Plan key management for HE schemes. Design encrypted search protocol.

title: Add fuzzing for volume header and crypto parsing
description: Implement cargo-fuzz targets for VolumeHeader deserialization, encrypted data parsing, and edge cases in unbounded input scenarios. Complements Kani's bounded symbolic execution by testing millions of mutations per second.

title: Develop kernel driver (Linux)
description: dm-crypt integration or custom kernel module

title: Create encrypted search index
description: Build encrypted inverted index for file contents. Support keyword searches without decryption. Implement privacy-preserving query protocols.

title: Add debugger detection
description: Detect attached debuggers (ptrace, DebugActiveProcess). Optionally clear keys on debugger detection. Add anti-debugging measures for release builds.

title: Implement Phase 5a: Post-boot system encryption
description: Encrypt system partition after OS loads (safer approach)

title: Create modular directory structure
description: Create src/crypto, src/storage, src/cli, src/gui, src/validation, src/error, src/config directories

title: Homomorphic Encryption Layer
description: Implement homomorphic encryption to enable operations on encrypted data without decryption. Includes searchable encryption and encrypted indexing for cloud scenarios.

title: Implement container creation
description: Create encrypted container files with filesystem

title: Generate proof certificates
description: Generate machine-checkable proof certificates for all verified properties. Export proofs in standard formats (Coq, Isabelle/HOL). Create proof artifact repository.

title: Add secure boot compatibility
description: Ensure compatibility with UEFI Secure Boot

title: Add Windows-specific features to WinFsp adapter (ACLs, streams, file IDs)
description: Handle Windows-specific filesystem features: security descriptors/ACLs, alternate data streams, file IDs, and reparse points

title: Implement browser-based decryption
description: Enable client-side file decryption in browser. Support File API and Blob handling. Add progress callbacks for large files.

title: Implement blockchain verification tools
description: Create tools to verify blockchain integrity. Implement merkle proof verification. Add chain fork detection and resolution.

title: Rename application from tesseract to tesseract-vault
Fix VolumeHeader PQC benchmarks in pqc_benchmark.rs
description: The VolumeHeader benchmarks were removed because the API was unclear. Need to investigate the proper VolumeHeader API for PQC volumes and implement benchmarks for: 1) Creating headers with PQC, 2) Parsing headers with PQC, 3) Unlocking headers with PQC. This is part of the comprehensive PQC benchmarking suite.

title: Add crypto operation logging
description: Log all encryption, decryption, key operations to blockchain. Include timestamps, user, file hash, operation type. Add privacy controls for sensitive metadata.

title: Fix API changes from generic-array to hybrid-array migration
description: Update all code using GenericArray to use new hybrid-array types. May affect Nonce, Key, and other crypto types.

title: Complete WinFsp mount implementation
description: Replace placeholder WinFsp mount implementation in src/volume/mount/winfsp.rs with full FileSystemContext integration for Windows encrypted volume mounting

title: Add GUI volume support
description: Extend GUI with volume creation wizard, mount/unmount controls, mounted volumes list, volume settings panel

title: Add memory dump protection
description: Protect against memory dump attacks (hiberfil, crash dumps). Disable core dumps for sensitive processes. Clear keys before hibernation.

title: Integrate Wycheproof cryptographic test suite
description: Add C2SP Wycheproof test vectors to validate AES-GCM, Argon2, and other crypto primitives against known attack vectors and edge cases.

title: Implement volume key derivation
description: Add key derivation for volumes using Argon2id, support for multiple key slots (multi-user), and secure key storage in memory

title: Add mutation testing with cargo-mutants
description:
Mutation testing verifies test suite quality by mutating code and checking if tests catch the mutations.

Implementation:
1. Add cargo-mutants to CI workflow
2. Configure mutation targets for crypto modules
3. Ensure high mutation score (>90%) for critical paths

CI job example:
  mutation-testing:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: dtolnay/rust-toolchain@stable
      - run: cargo install cargo-mutants
      - run: cargo mutants --package tesseract-vault --no-times -- --lib

Focus areas:
- AES-GCM encryption/decryption
- Argon2id key derivation
- Nonce generation and validation
- Error handling paths

title: Add PKCS#11 hardware token support
description: YubiKey, smart cards, HSM integration

title: Implement Intel TME support
description: Integrate Intel Total Memory Encryption. Enable full memory encryption at hardware level. Add TME capability detection and configuration.

title: Create crypto module with traits
description: Define Encryptor, KeyDerivation traits and implement AES-256-GCM

title: Implement secure key storage
description: Store decryption keys securely in TPM or derive from password

title: Design blockchain audit schema
description: Design blockchain data structure for audit logs. Define block format for crypto operations. Plan merkle tree for efficient verification. Design query interface.

title: Add PQ metadata size limit validation during container creation
description: Enforce hard limit check during Container::create() to ensure PQ metadata doesn't exceed PQ_METADATA_RESERVED (8KB). Currently PQ metadata is ~6.3KB for ML-KEM-1024, but future algorithms might be larger. Should error before writing to disk if serialized metadata exceeds limit.

title: Write network security tests
description: Test network protocol security. Implement fuzzing for protocol parser. Add penetration testing suite. Verify E2E encryption correctness.

title: Implement WinFspMountHandle lifecycle management
description: Complete WinFspMountHandle with proper unmount in Drop trait, FileSystemHost management, and error handling utilities

title: Verify build and run tests after migration
description: Ensure cargo build --release succeeds and all tests pass

title: Add constant-time execution verification with dudect
description: Implement timing leak detection using dudect-bencher to verify AES-GCM and Argon2 run in constant time regardless of input values. Prevents timing side-channel attacks that could leak keys even if formal verification proves mathematical correctness.

title: Add HE performance optimizations
description: Optimize HE operations with batching and parallelization. Implement hardware acceleration for HE. Add caching for encrypted operations.

title: Define explicit on-disk volume layout
description: Hardcode and document volume layout: [Header Area: 0-8KB][Key Slots: 8KB-16KB][Data Area: 16KB+]. Add constants for offsets. Update container.rs with explicit seek positions.

title: Research and evaluate PQC algorithms
description: Research NIST PQC competition winners (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium, SPHINCS+). Evaluate Rust implementations (pqcrypto, oqs-sys). Document algorithm selection rationale.

title: Add progress reporting trait
description: Define ProgressReporter trait for UI feedback

title: Select lightweight blockchain framework
description: Evaluate Substrate, Tendermint, custom implementation. Prioritize lightweight, embedded-friendly solutions. Assess storage and performance requirements.

title: Integrate VolumeIOFilesystem with WinFsp adapter
description: Update the WinFsp adapter (src/volume/mount/winfsp.rs) to use VolumeIOFilesystem instead of InMemoryFilesystem. This makes mounted volumes persistent - data survives unmount/remount cycles.

title: Add volume management module
description: Create VolumeManager for mount/unmount operations, handle multiple mounted volumes, track mount points, volume locking

title: Update Cargo.toml with test dependencies
description: Add proptest, criterion, and other dev dependencies

title: Fix WinFsp API compatibility issues (imports, FileInfo fields, DirInfo methods)
description: The WinFsp implementation has API compatibility issues: missing windows crate, incorrect DirInfo/VolumeInfo/OpenFileInfo method names, FileInfo struct fields. Need to reference actual winfsp examples or documentation to get API right.

title: Add NVMe/ATA Secure Erase support
description: Implement hardware-level secure erase using NVMe Format/Sanitize commands or ATA Secure Erase. This is the ONLY reliable way to erase data on SSDs. Warn users that file-level deletion is not secure on SSDs.

title: Optional Ethereum smart contract integration
description: Create smart contract for public audit anchoring. Support Ethereum, Polygon, other EVM chains. Implement batched anchoring for cost efficiency.

title: Implement metadata sanitization
description: Strip metadata from encrypted files (timestamps, author, EXIF). Randomize file sizes with padding. Clear filesystem metadata (journal, slack space).

title: Update encrypt_file and decrypt_file to use streaming for memory efficiency
description: Replace in-memory encryption with ChunkedEncryptor/ChunkedDecryptor to handle large files efficiently. Maintain backward compatibility for v1 format decryption.

title: Implement theming support
description: Light/dark mode and custom themes

title: Verify nonce construction
description: Verify NIST SP 800-38D compliant nonce construction for streaming encryption. Prove: no nonce reuse, proper chunk counter increment, bounds checking.

title: Fix console window appearing behind GUI
description: Add windows_subsystem attribute to hide console

title: Create VolumeIOFilesystem implementation
description: Create a new filesystem implementation that stores both metadata (directory structure, file attributes) and file content in VolumeIO. This requires: 1) Design a superblock format for the start of the volume 2) Implement inode table for file metadata 3) Store file content in subsequent blocks 4) Implement EncryptedFilesystem trait using VolumeIO for all I/O

title: Implement encrypted FS operations
description: Implement core filesystem operations: read, write, getattr, readdir, mkdir, rmdir, create, unlink, rename with encryption/decryption

title: Blockchain Audit Log System
description: Implement immutable, tamper-proof audit logging using blockchain technology. Track all cryptographic operations with verifiable integrity for compliance and forensics.

title: Add searchable encryption for filenames
description: Implement searchable symmetric encryption for file metadata. Support wildcard searches on encrypted filenames. Use deterministic or order-preserving encryption where appropriate.

title: Add Miri undefined behavior detection
description: Integrate Miri to catch undefined behavior in unsafe blocks, FFI usage (libc, winapi, fuser), and memory operations that Kani might miss. Critical for detecting misaligned pointers, data races, and invalid memory access in low-level crypto code.

title: Add CLI commands for volumes
description: Add CLI commands: volume create, volume mount, volume unmount, volume list, volume info, volume change-password

title: Add hidden volume support
description: Plausible deniability with nested volumes

title: Add SSD wear-leveling awareness
description: Detect SSD storage and adjust secure deletion. Account for wear-leveling that moves data. Use TRIM/UNMAP commands appropriately. Add NVMe secure erase support.

title: Refactor main.rs to use modules
description: Update binary to use new modular structure

title: Research Rust formal verification tools
description: Evaluate Prusti (ETH Zurich), Kani (Amazon), Creusot (Inria). Compare capabilities, maturity, and suitability for crypto verification. Document tool selection.

title: Migrate from forked RustCrypto crates to upstream
description: Remove all forked RustCrypto crates and migrate to upstream versions. Upstream now uses hybrid-array instead of generic-array. Key changes: aes-gcm 0.10.3->0.11.0-rc.2, aead 0.5.0-pre.2->0.6.0-rc.3, crypto-common 0.1.6->0.2.0-rc.5, cipher 0.4.4->0.5.0-rc.2

title: Implement batch operations queue
description: Queue multiple files for processing

title: Design encrypted network protocol
description: Design custom network protocol for encrypted file sharing. Define packet format, authentication flow, encryption scheme. Use TLS 1.3 as transport layer.

title: Complete hidden volume mounting
description: Finish hidden volume mounting implementation in main.rs:561-575. Currently creates manager and options but doesn't perform actual filesystem mount. Need to refactor VolumeManager to accept Container directly.

title: Verify key derivation functions
description: Verify master key derivation and key slot operations. Prove: keys properly derived from passwords, no cross-slot key leakage, proper zeroization.

title: Hardware Security Module Integration
description: Integrate hardware security devices (YubiKey, FIDO2, TPM 2.0, Intel SGX, AMD SEV, Smart Cards) for enterprise-grade key management and isolated execution.

title: Configure cargo-deny for supply chain policy enforcement
description:
cargo-deny provides policy-based linting for dependencies, licenses, and security advisories.

Implementation:
1. Create deny.toml configuration file
2. Configure policies for:
   - License compliance (require approved licenses)
   - Security advisories (fail on vulnerabilities)
   - Dependency sources (only crates.io + git)
   - Duplicate dependencies (minimize)
3. Add pre-commit hook
4. Add CI enforcement

Example deny.toml:
[advisories]
db-path = "~/.cargo/advisory-db"
vulnerability = "deny"
unmaintained = "warn"

[licenses]
unlicensed = "deny"
allow = ["MIT", "Apache-2.0", "BSD-3-Clause"]
copyleft = "deny"

[sources]
unknown-registry = "deny"
unknown-git = "deny"
allow-registry = ["https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"]

CI job:
  cargo-deny:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: EmbarkStudios/cargo-deny-action@v1

title: Develop kernel driver (Windows)
description: Filter driver for transparent disk encryption

title: Research HE libraries for Rust
description: Evaluate concrete (Zama), SEAL bindings, HElib wrappers. Compare partial vs fully homomorphic encryption. Assess performance and usability.

title: Implement chunked decryptor
description: Decrypt chunked files with integrity verification

title: Replace JSON with bincode for PqVolumeMetadata
description: PqVolumeMetadata uses serde_json which is verbose and non-deterministic. Should use bincode for compact, fast, deterministic serialization.

title: Evaluate GUI framework options
description: Compare Tauri, egui, Iced - select best for project

title: Verify refactored code works
description: Run all tests, ensure binary compiles and functions correctly

title: Implement mlock for sensitive data
description: Use mlock()/VirtualLock() to prevent memory swapping. Lock keys, passwords, plaintext in RAM. Handle mlock limits and failures gracefully.

title: Implement WinFsp FileSystemContext trait for WinFspAdapter
description: Implement all ~20 required methods of winfsp::FileSystemContext trait, mapping operations from InMemoryFilesystem to WinFsp callbacks. Follow pattern from fuse.rs implementation.

title: Add Web Worker support
description: Run crypto operations in Web Workers for non-blocking UI. Support SharedArrayBuffer for zero-copy transfers. Add worker pool management.

title: Create REST API for automation
description: Programmatic access for enterprise workflows

title: Write comprehensive PQC test suite
description: Write unit tests for Kyber and Dilithium integration. Test hybrid mode operation. Add interoperability tests. Test migration tool edge cases.

title: Add compression support
description: Integrate Zstandard compression before encryption

title: Encrypted Network File System
description: Implement end-to-end encrypted network file system with P2P sharing, WebDAV/SFTP frontends, multi-user collaboration, and perfect forward secrecy for secure remote access.

title: Add recovery mechanism
description: Emergency password reset and recovery procedures

title: Add hidden volume mounting support to mount functions
description: Add MountOptions with hidden_offset/is_hidden_volume fields, update mount flow in WinFsp and FUSE to handle hidden volumes

title: Implement cloud backup integration
description: Encrypted backups to cloud storage

title: Implement multi-factor authentication
description: Support password + key file + hardware token

title: Phase 6: Enterprise Features
description: Key management, policy enforcement, and enterprise integration

title: Add header recovery tool
description: Create CLI tool to recover corrupted primary header from backup. Add option to restore backup to primary. Implement header validation and repair functionality.

title: Design on-disk format for persistent filesystem
description: Design the binary format for storing filesystem metadata persistently in the volume. Include: 1) Superblock with volume info, free block bitmap, inode count 2) Inode table with file/dir metadata 3) Data block allocation 4) Journal or WAL for crash recovery. Consider compatibility with future versions.

title: Implement CRYSTALS-Kyber key encapsulation
description:
Integrate ML-KEM-1024 (formerly CRYSTALS-Kyber) for post-quantum key encapsulation.

RESOLVED: Found workaround for rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2 API incompatibility

Updated findings (2025-11-21):
 Successfully updated argon2 to 0.6.0-rc.2 (uses rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2)
 Successfully updated rand to 0.10.0-rc.5 (uses rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2)  
 Updated forked crypto-common to use rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2
 All dependencies now aligned on rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2
 All 159 tests passing

SOLUTION FOUND:
Based on Stack Overflow (https://stackoverflow.com/q/79473286) and GitHub issue (https://github.com/rust-random/rand/issues/1561):

1. For SaltString generation:
   - Use OsRng.try_fill_bytes() to manually fill a byte array
   - Use SaltString::encode_b64() to create the salt string
   - This bypasses the CryptoRng trait requirement

2. For ML-KEM encapsulate() (requires CryptoRng):
   - Use OsRng.unwrap_err() which returns UnwrapErr<OsRng>
   - UnwrapErr<OsRng> implements CryptoRng trait
   - This provides panic-on-error semantics expected for OsRng

Changes applied:
- src/crypto/kdf.rs: Updated salt generation to use manual byte filling
- src/crypto/streaming.rs: Updated all test code to use try_fill_bytes()
- All compilation errors resolved
- All tests passing

Ready to proceed with ML-KEM integration using OsRng.unwrap_err() approach.

title: Design GUI mockups and UX flow
description: Create wireframes for main window, settings, progress

title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Integration
description: Implement post-quantum cryptographic algorithms (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium) for future-proof encryption. Includes hybrid classical+PQC mode and migration tools for existing volumes.

title: Implement CRYSTALS-Dilithium signatures
description: Integrate Dilithium for post-quantum digital signatures. Support Dilithium2, Dilithium3, Dilithium5 security levels. Add signing and verification for volume headers and audit logs.

title: Create power state monitoring module
description: Create src/system/power.rs with PowerCallback trait and platform-specific implementations for Windows (RegisterPowerSettingNotification), Linux (DBus systemd-logind), macOS (IORegisterForSystemPower)
